Product data representation and exchange —
Part 1000:
STEP Module and Resource Library: Overview
collection_page.p: This part of ISO 10303 contains an overview of the Standard for the Exchange of Product Model Data (STEP) Module and Resource Library (SMRL). The elements of the SMRL are used as building blocks by the ISO 10303 application protocols (APs). An AP specifies the use of the integrated resources necessary for the scope and information requirements for some application.

note.small: NOTE The elements making up the SMRL are the ISO 10303 application modules (AMs), application interpreted constructs (AICs), and integrated resources (IRs), and ISO 13584-20.
